post:
Host Expert provides dedicated servers, VDS, cloud backup in 2 locations in Romania starting in 2013. Host Expert brand belongs to Soft Expert Ltd. All the servers in Ploiesti Data Center are HPE DL180 Gen9 and HPE DL380 Gen9

•CPU 2 x Xeon E5-2690v4 2.60 GHz
•2GB RAM
•80GB HDD
•1Gbps Uplink
•Unmetered Bandwidth
•1 IP
•Free setup

Options:
•DDoS Protection
•Additional IPs
•Additional CPU
•Additional RAM
•Additional HDD

5 EUR (use coupon: HB20 - recurrent discount. Discounted price will be in the invoice.)

IPv4 /24
•55 EUR for monthly contract (50 EUR setup)
•45 EUR for 1 year contract (50 EUR setup)
•40 EUR for 2 year contract (no setup fees)

Information:
•Set your own RIPE netname and description.
•Verified companies can also have their own “Responsible organisation” and abuse handling.
•We will assign the prefix as a “SUB-ALLOCATED PA”.
•We do NOT provide IP addresses for spam and phishing

We accept credit/debit card, PayPal and bank transfer.
